Descripciones: Las clases para la adquisición del idioma inglés están diseñadas para personas que no hablan inglés y que quieren mejorar su expresión oral, de  lectura y de escritura del idioma inglés.

Descriptions: Education services provided to English language learners who are adults, that enables them to achieve competency in the English language and acquire the basic and more advanced skills.
Descripciones: Las clases para la adquisición del idioma inglés están diseñadas para personas que no hablan inglés y que quieren mejorar su expresión oral, de  lectura y de escritura del idioma inglés.

Descriptions: Project BLOC is for people whose primary language is not English. Project BLOC helps people ages 18 and over, including farmworkers and their families, access language education and work skills training.
Descripciones: El Proyecto BLOC ha sido diseñado para personas cuya lengua principal no es inglés. El Proyecto Bloc ayuda a personas de 18 años de edad y mayoers, incluyendo a trabajadores agrícolas y sus familias, proveer entrenamiento sobre educación de lenguaje y destrezas de empleo.

Descriptions: EL Pueblo’s mission is for Latinos to achieve positive social change by building consciousness, capacity, and community action.
Descripciones: Nuestra misión es que los latinos logremos un cambio social positivo a través de la concienciación, capacitación y acción comunitaria.

Descriptions: The FLOC vision emphasizes human rights as the standard and self-determination as the process for achieving these rights. We work to change the structures of society to enable workers to have a direct voice in their own conditions.
Farmworker Advocacy Network is a statewide network of organizations that work to improve living and working conditions of farmworkers and poultry workers in North Carolina.
Descripciones: FAN es una red estate de organizaciones que buscan mejorar las condiciones de vida y de trabajo de los trabajadores de campo y del sector avícola en Carolina del Norte.

Descriptions: NFWM supports farm worker-led campaigns to improve their working and living conditions by educating and mobilizing faith communities and young people.  NFWM is the sole faith-based organization supporting all the major farm worker unions and associations in the US.

Our mission is to bring students and farmworkers together to learn about each other’s lives, share resources and skills, improve conditions for farmworkers, and build diverse coalitions working for social change.
Descripciones: Estudiantes en Acción con Campesinos (Student Action with Farmworkers - SAF) es una organización sin fines de lucro 501(c)3 que conecta a estudiantes y trabajadores agrícolas para que aprendan mutuamente de sus vidas respectivas, compartan recursos y habilidades, mejoren las condiciones para trabajadores agrícolas, y formen coaliciones diversas que trabajan por el cambio social.

Descriptions: Toxic Free NC engages North Carolinians in the transition to a toxic-free society through initiatives that promote human and environmental health.

Our mission is to find resources for and make connections with farmworkers, as well as support union organizing for better working conditions, increase awareness of human costs of food productions, and collaborate with existing organizations to promote justice.

Our highly-trained advocates are available 24/7 to talk confidentially with anyone experiencing domestic violence, seeking resources or information, or questioning unhealthy aspects of their relationship.
Descripciones: Nuestros asesores altamente capacitados están disponibles las 24 horas, 7 días de la semana y los 365 días del año para conversar de manera confidencial con toda persona o algún ser querida que pueda verse afectada por violencia doméstica, que esté buscando recursos de ayuda e información o que tenga preguntas sobre aspectos dañinos de su relación de pareja

Organization Name: Legal Aid of NC Battered Immigrant Project
Descriptions: The Battered Immigrant Project (BIP), part of our Domestic Violence Prevention Initiative​, provides comprehensive and culturally appropriate legal services to immigrant survivors of violence needing assistance with immigration.

Organization Name: Legal Aid of NC Farmworker Unit
Descriptions: The Farmworker Unit is a statewide project of Legal Aid of North Carolina committed to providing high quality civil legal services to address the special legal needs of migrant and seasonal farmworkers in North Carolina.
Descripciones: Estamos comprometidos a brindar servicios legales de alta calidad para atender casos civiles. Nuestros servicios son gratuitos y se enfocan en las necesidades legales especiales de los trabajadores agrícolas migrantes y temporales en Carolina del Norte.

Descriptions: Adelante focuses on education issues affecting Latino and migrant students and their families in the state. The coalition is a collaboration among nonprofit organizations that focus on advocacy and public policy, community organizing, and grassroots support.
Descripciones: La Coalición de Educación Adelante se enfoca en asuntos educativos que afectan a estudiantes hispanos/latinos y a estudiantes migrantes y sus familias en Carolina del Norte. Adelante es una colaboración entre organizaciones no-lucrativas que se concentran en abogacía, política publica, organización comunitaria y apoyo a la comunidad.

Descriptions: We seek to create pathways to educational, professional, and civic engagement opportunities for a new generation of Latinx leaders in North Carolina.
Descripciones: Buscamos crear vías de acceso a las oportunidades de participación educativa, profesional y cívica para la próxima generación de líderes latinx en Carolina del Norte.

Organization Name: East Coast Migrant Head Start Project: Regional Office
Descriptions: Head Start is a national program that promotes school readiness by enhancing the social and cognitive development of children. At East Coast Migrant Head Start Project, we provide a full array of Head Start services to migrant and seasonal farmworker families.
Descripciones: Head Start es un programa nacional que promueve la preparación escolar al mejorar el desarrollo social y cognitivo de los niños. En East Coast Migrant Head Start Project, ofrecemos una gama completa de servicios de Head Start para familias trabajadoras agrícolas migrantes y de temporada.

Descriptions: Head Start is a national program that promotes school readiness by enhancing the social and cognitive development of children. At East Coast Migrant Head Start Project, we provide a full array of Head Start services to migrant and seasonal farmworker families.

Descriptions: Head Start is a federal preschool program that promotes the school readiness of children ages birth to 5 from low-income families by enhancing their cognitive, social, and emotional development.
Descripciones: Head Start es un programa preescolar federal que promueve la preparación escolar de los niños desde recién nacidos hasta 5 de las familias de bajos ingresos mediante la mejora de su desarrollo cognitivo, social y emocional.

Descriptions: Our mission is to help migrant students and youth meet high academic challenges by overcoming the obstacles created by frequent moves, educational disruption, cultural and language differences, and health-related problems.
NC Works Career Centers’ employment consultants help place farm workers on jobs and ensure that migrant and seasonal farmworkers have access to the same services as the general public.

Organization Name: Telamon Corporation: National Farmworker Jobs Program (NFJP) State Office
Descriptions: Telamon Corporation is dedicated to the economic upgrading of migrant and other seasonally employed farmworkers.  They administer a wide range of employment, training and supportive services in various eastern states.
Descripciones: El NFJP proporciona acceso a servicios de educación y capacitación para el trabajo, soporte y servicios adicionales adaptados a objetivos de carrera del cliente: Ayuda para encontrar un empleo, evaluación de las habilidades e intereses, orientación professional, formación en el aula y otros servicios.

Descriptions: The Division of Vocational Rehabilitation Services provides counseling, training, education, transportation, job placement, assistive technology and other support services to people with disabilities.

Organization Name: Department of Social Services: NC DHHS - Division of Social Services
Descriptions: The Division of Social Services (DSS) provides guidance and technical assistance to agencies that provide direct services that address issues of poverty, family violence and exploitation.

Organization Name: North Carolina Department of Agriculture, Pesticide Section
Person of Contact: James W. Burnette, Jr. Sergio Morales
Descriptions: To protect the public health, safety and welfare, and to promote continued environmental quality by minimizing and managing risks associated with the legal use of pesticides through administration and enforcement

Organization Name: North Carolina Department of Environment, Health and Natural Resources
Descriptions: The NC Department of Environmental Quality (DEQ) administers regulatory programs designed to protect air quality, water quality, and the public's health.

North Carolina Department of Labor is responsible for inspecting migrant labor housing and field sanitation conditions pursuant to the Migrant Housing Act of NC and the Occupational Safety and Health Act of NC.

Organization Name: North Carolina Department of Labor, Wage and Hour Division
Descriptions: North Carolina Department of Labor, Wage and Hour Division administers the North Carolina Wage and Hour Act.  This law provides a means by which employees, including MSFWs, can seek recovery of unpaid wages

Organization Name: The Center for Worker Health at Wake Forest University School of Medicine
Street Address: Wake Forest Univ. School of Medicine
Descriptions: The Center for Worker Health promotes worker and occupational health research and practice. It brings together investigators, health care providers, community members and business leaders interested in protecting and promoting worker health.
Descripciones: El Centro para la Salud de los Trabajadores, Facultad de Medicina de Wake Forest promueve la investigación sobre el trabajador y la salud ocupacional y la práctica. Reúne a investigadores, profesionales de la salud, miembros de la comunidad y líderes empresariales interesados en la protección y promoción de la salud del trabajador.

Descriptions: At CommWell Health we strive to make this patient-centered service comprehensive, quality care to create a HOME for all your health and wellness needs.

At Vecinos, Inc. we envision a safe place to work and live for all farmworkers in North Carolina.  This includes access to affordable health care, equal protection under the law, and full recognition and participation in the communities that we share.
Descripciones: En Vecinos, Inc. prevemos un lugar seguro para vivir y trabajar para todos los trabajadores agrícolas en Carolina del Norte.  Esto incluye acceso a un cuidado de salud económico, la protección igual bajo la ley, y el reconocimiento y la participación completos en las comunidades en las que vivimos.

Descriptions: Our mission is to glorify God through the provision of spiritual, social, and medical support, to the underserved.
Our vision is to increase access to high quality, affordable and integrated care to our communities, focusing on the underserved, uninsured and underinsured.

We are dedicated to the highest standards of primary and preventive healthcare. We are committed to demonstrate leadership throughout the community as evidenced by the number of partnerships that help to make the Community Health Center a success.
Descripciones: Nuestra meta es ser su socio en la asistencia de salud para servir como su hogar medico. Estamos comprometidos a poner a su disposición un médico personal que provee para todas sus necesidades de salud y coordina su atención médica en todas las situaciones

Descriptions: We are determined to deliver quality health care to everyone with compassion, devotion and clinical sophistication; because we all deserve the benefits of a healthier life.
Carolina Family Health Centers provides accessible health care with excellence and commitment to a patients first philosophy
Descripciones: CHFC proporciona cuidados de dalud accesible con excelencia y el compromiso para la primer filosofia del paciente.

Descriptions: Our mission is to improve the health status of its community and reduce health disparities by serving as an access point for healthcare.

Blue Ridge Health provides comprehensive, quality primary care services to all. It brings together family medicine for adults and children, prenatal care, dentistry, counseling, psychiatry, nutrition, discount pharmacy, and health education services under one roof.
Descripciones: Blue Ridge Health provee servicios médicos comprensivos de alta calidad a todos. Blue Ridge Health proporciona servicios que incluyen medicina familiar para adultos y niños, cuidado prenatal, cuidado dental, consejería, psiquiatría, nutrición, farmacia con descuentos, y clases sobre la salud.

Descriptions: North Carolina Agromedicine Institute is a partnership of East Carolina University, NC State University and NC A&T State University.  Its mission is to promote the health and safety of farmers, fishermen, loggers, their workers and their families through research, prevention/intervention and education/outreach

Organization Name: The North Carolina Community Health Center Association (NCCHCA)
Descriptions: The North Carolina Community Health Center Association is a valuable resource to health centers and other organizations, providing training and technical assistance in areas such as clinical service delivery, cultural competency, workforce development, and administration.

Organization Name: NC Farmworkers Project/ Benson Area Medical Center
Descriptions: The North Carolina Farmworker Health Program works to improve the health of migrant and seasonal farmworkers and their families by providing funding, training, and technical assistance to a statewide network of outreach and health care providers.

The mission of the Surry County Health & Nutrition Center is to protect and promote personal, family and community health; to insure a safe and healthy environment; and to prevent or control the incidence and spread of disease.
Descripciones: La misión del Centro de Salud y Nutrición del Condado de Surry es proteger y promover la vida personal, familiar y salud comunitaria; para asegurar un ambiente seguro y saludable; y para prevenir o controlar la incidencia y la propagación de enfermedades.

Descriptions: The mission of the Jones County Health Department is to promote sound health policies, prevent and control the spread of disease, and safeguard the integrity of the environment for all citizens of Jones County.

Duke Primary Care Oxford is a comprehensive primary care clinic offering family medicine care and lab services in one convenient location. Our clinic is located off of College Street in Oxford, not far from Granville Medical Center, convenient to families in Granville and surrounding counties.
Striving to improve the health of migrant and seasonal farm workers and their families in Mitchell, Yancey, Madison and McDowell counties
Descripciones: Esforzándonos para mejorar la salud de los trabajadores agriculturales migrantes y de temporada y sus familias en los condados de Mitchell, Yancey, Madison y McDowell.

Descriptions: To support the provision of high quality, compassionate healthcare for the mountain region of northwest North Carolina, northeast Tennessee with a spirit of teamwork based on a set of operating values.

Organization Name: The North Carolina Farmworker Health Program
Descriptions: The North Carolina Farmworker Health Program of the Office of Rural Health works to improve the health of migrant and seasonal farmworkers and their families by providing funding, training, and technical assistance to a statewide network of outreach and health care providers.

Street Address: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
Descriptions: Enlaces por la salud is a program in North Carolina focused on aiding Mexican/Mexican-American males and Transgender women in connecting to HIV care and support services.
Descripciones: Enlaces por la salud es un programa en Carolina del Norte que se enfoca en conectar a las comunidades de hombres Mexicanos/Mexicanos-Americanos y mujeres transgéneros con servicios de atención y apoyo para el VIH.

Descriptions: Telamon Corporation is a HUD-approved Local Housing Counseling Agency and provides housing counseling assistance to MSFW families and individuals, including fair housing assistance, homebuyer education programs, loss mitigation, etc.

The Workers’ Rights Project strives to enforce and expand policies that ensure safe workplaces, fair treatment, a living wage, and a strong safety net in times of hardship. We also seek to improve the well-being of working families and enable workers to access economic security.

We provide support to immigrant organizations throughout North Carolina. We plan and facilitate workshops on issues such as anti-immigrant legislation, immigrant worker layoffs, workers’ rights, housing and consumer law, public benefits, the unjust federal immigration system, and strategies for community organizing.
The Consumer Protections and Housing Project is dedicated to improving housing conditions for low-income people and to protecting North Carolinians from harmful and abusive business practices.

Organization Name: Baptist State Convention of North Carolina
Catholic Social Services: Casa Guadalupe Greensboro
High Point Office: Latino Family Center
Catholic Charities of Raleigh: Wilmington Office
Catholic Charities Diocese of Charlotte: Murphy Office
Catholic Charities Diocese of Charlotte: Asheville Office

Descriptions: Through education, the protection of their human rights, and the care of their bodies and souls, EFwM works to change the world and the system that keeps farmworkers in poverty and subhuman conditions.
Descripciones: Por la educación, la defense de sus derechos humanos, y por el cuidado de sus cuerpos y almoas, EFwM trabaja para cambiar el mundo y el Sistema que los mantiene en cautiverio en pobreza y condiciones infrahumanas.

Organization Name: North Carolina Council of Churches Farmworker Ministry Committee
Descriptions: The North Carolina Council of Churches works to help improve living and working conditions of farmworkers by raising public awareness, publishing fact sheets and Bible-based curriculum, connection seminary students with rural ministries and health clinics, sponsoring interns to document conditions, and participating in dynamic statewide coalitions
